FwkSenCnt.MEANING: with great academic distinction (second only to summa cum laude)

ExCnt.EX: Joshipura , whose family is from Gujarat , India went to school in the US , graduating magna cum laude from Old Dominion University in Virginia .
Steven I Davis is a graduate ( magna cum laude ) of Amherst College and of the Harvard Business School .
She has a degree in finance , magna cum laude , from New York University .
